html:
<head>




  

Inputekno.Com | linktree











  
















  



/****CSS CODE*****/
:root{
--bs-tooltip-bg: #f1c40f;
--bs-tooltip-padding-x:10px;
}
@import url('https://fonts.googleapis.com/css2?family=Poppins&family=Dosis:wght@100&display=swap');
@import url('https://fonts.googleapis.com/css2?family=Poppins:wght@10&display=swap');
body {margin:0;padding:0}
*{font-family:'Poppins',sans-serif;box-sizing:border-box}
.container-fluid{background:linear-gradient(30deg,#e95950,#bc2a8d,#fccc63,#8a3ab9);background-size: 450% 450%;animation:gradient 10s ease infinite;padding:1rem}
@keyframes gradient{0%{background-position:0% 50%}50%{background-position:100% 50%}100%{background-position:0% 50%}}
/* List Menu Linktree 1 */
.LinktreeList {max-width: 580px;display: block;margin: 27px auto;}
.container-fluid .LinktreeList a{text-align:center;margin-top:20px;margin-left:auto;margin-right:auto;padding:15px;border:1px solid #fff;display:block;border-radius:15px;position:relative;font-size:17px;width:680px;max-width:95%;transition:all .3s ease-in-out;color:#fff;text-decoration:none}
.container-fluid .LinktreeList a:hover, .gears a:hover{text-decoration:none;background-color:#fff;color:#2d3748;transition:all .2s;transform:scale(1.03)}
.links i{padding:15px;display:block;left:20px;position:absolute;top:0;bottom:0;font-size:17px}
/* Profile Name */
.profile-picture{max-width:100px;height:auto;margin-left:auto;margin-right:auto;display:block}
.profile-name{text-align:center;padding:10px;color:#fff;font-size:20px;font-weight:bold}
.profile-about{text-align:center;color:#fff;letter-spacing:2px;font-size:15px}
/* List Menu Linktree 2 */
.LinktreeList-2 {text-align:center;max-width:100%;display:block}
.LinktreeList-2 h3{font-size:17px;color:#fff;}
.gears{width:680px;max-width:95%;margin:10px auto;margin-left:auto;margin-right:auto}
.gears a{display:inline-block;color:#fff;border:solid #fff 1px;border-radius:10px;padding:12px;margin-bottom:5px;transition:all .25s cubic-bezier(.08,.59,.29,.99);text-decoration:none;font-weight:500;font-size:14px}
.gear i{padding-right:5px;display:inline-block;}
/* Footers */
footer{padding:40px;font-size:14px}
.footer-section{text-align:center;color:#fff;border-top: 1px solid #fff;padding: 15px 0;}
.footer-section .footer-text i{color:#b61818}
.footer-section .footer-text a, .fotCd a{color:#fff;text-decoration:none}
/* DarkMode */
.Switchdark{height:70px;width:100%;padding:.5rem 1rem;display:flex;position:relative;align-items:center;justify-content:flex-end}
.SwitchdarkLb{background:#333;width:40px;height:40px;padding:5px;display:flex;align-items:center;justify-content:center;border-radius:50%}
.toggledarkwendy{display:none;}
.toggledarkwendy-btn{display:flex;align-items:center; width:26px;height:26px;}
.toggledarkwendy-btn svg{fill:#f1c40f;stroke:none;}
.toggledarkwendy-btn .svg-1{display:inline-block}
.toggledarkwendy-btn .svg-2{display:none}
.darkmode .toggledarkwendy-switch:checked + .toggledarkwendy-btn .svg-1{display:none}
.darkmode .toggledarkwendy-switch:checked + .toggledarkwendy-btn .svg-2{display:inline-block}
.darkmode .toggledarkwendy-btn svg{stroke:none}
.darkmode .toggledarkwendy-btn .svg-1{display:none}
.darkmode .toggledarkwendy-btn .svg-2{display:inline-block}
.darkmode .container-fluid{background:#141f2a}/* #2d3748 */
.darkmode .container-fluid .LinktreeList a{background:#1e2732}
.darkmode .container-fluid .LinktreeList a:hover{color:#fff}
.darkmode .gears a:hover{color:rgb(29, 155, 240);background:none}
@media screen and (min-width:768px){::-webkit-scrollbar{-webkit-appearance:none;width:4px;height:5px}::-webkit-scrollbar-track{background:transparent}::-webkit-scrollbar-thumb{background:rgba(0,0,0,.15);border-radius:10px}::-webkit-scrollbar-thumb:hover{background:rgba(0,0,0,.35)}::-webkit-scrollbar-thumb:active{background:rgba(0,0,0,.35)}}
.custom-tooltip {--bs-tooltip-bg: #f1c40f;--bs-tooltip-padding-x:10px;}





var uri=window.location.toString();if(uri.indexOf("?m=1","?m=1")>0){var clean_uri=uri.substring(0,uri.indexOf("?m=1"));window.history.replaceState({},document.title,clean_uri)}
